title: Turn Up
lyrics:
[Producer Tag: YG]
Mustard on the beat, hoe
[Hook: Justin Bieber]
It's crazy when you're in the club, you hear your song, you're ready to turn up, turn up
[Bridge: Justin Bieber]
Dancing with somebody
The way you move your body
Saturday morning
Take my number
Just call me
Hey girl, I like it when you do it like that
I like it when you do it like that
Hey girl
I like it when you do it like that
Why you always do me like that
[Hook: Justin Bieber]
It's crazy when you're in the club, you hear your song, you're ready to turn up, turn up
[Bridge: Justin Bieber]
Dancing with somebody
The way you move your body
Saturday morning
Take my number
Just call me
Hey girl, I like it when you do it like that
I like it when you do it like that
Hey girl
I like it when you do it like that
Why you always do me like that
